EULA :
AGREEMENT END USER LICENSE AGREEMENT ("EULA")
THE FOLLOWING TERMS AND CONDITIONS (THE "EULA") FOR USE THIS SOFTWARE. THESE ARE THE ONLY RIGHTS YOU HAVE ON THIS SOFTWARE. THEREFORE, IF YOU DO NOT ACCEPT THIS "EULA" DO NOT USE THE SOFTWARE.
CONSENT: By accepting the terms of the license or opening the bundle containing the software, you agree to (i) this EULA as valid and legally binding. You agree to (ii) respect the rights intellectual property and all conditions of this EULA, and you agree to (iii) take all necessary measures to ensure no condition of this EULA is breached by a person or entity under your authority or your service.
GRANT OF LICENSE: Licensor grants you the personal, limited, nonexclusive, nontransferable and transferable to only requirement to use a single copy of software on one computer or device and a single concurrent user, and only if you adhere to all conditions of this EULA. Third-party software delivered in the same time that this software is distributed under the terms of the agreement license accompanying the software. "Software" means software or firmware of a device and any associated documentation (including including design, systems and user documentation) and any other factor which is related to the use of this software bundle. " Third Party Software "means the Software and the license that accompanies owned by a company other than Arsslensoft, but which nevertheless may be distributed and / or installed at the same time as the Software distributed under of this EULA. The foregoing is an express authorization of use limited and not an assignment, sale or other transfer of software or intellectual property right (as defined below) Provider license.
RESTRICTIONS:
(A) It is prohibited to copy, modify, combine, sell, lease, redistribute, assign or otherwise transfer the Software or any part thereof.
(B) You may make a single copy for backup purposes, elements included in this bundle or related software.
(C) It is also forbidden to reverse engineer, decompile, translate, disassemble, decrypt, decrypt, or try some Another way to discover the source code of software. You also can not more change, alter, adapt, or be combined software.
(D) You can not remove, alter, disguise, cover or deface an otherwise patent, trademark, service mark or notice of copyright Provider's license.
(E) You may not publish or distribute, in electronic publishing or printed, the information contained or linked to Software, including but would limitation, object code, documentation, help files, examples and performance tests.
NO COMMERCIAL USE: This EULA grants you the right to use software solely for your personal use. Commercial use our software or products derived from its use is not authorized by this EULA.
COMPLIANCE WITH LAWS: You agree that in obtaining, installing, distributing, performing or otherwise taking advantage of the software, you comply with all applicable laws, including without limitation laws intellectual property and export control.
TERM: This license is effective until terminated. You may terminate this license at any time by uninstalling the software. Upon termination, you agree to uninstall the software and return or destroy all copies software, any accompanying documentation and all other related items.
GOVERNING LAW: This EULA is governed by the laws of the State of California and the laws of the United States, except conflict of law principles. The Convention United Nations on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods (1980) is excluded in its entirety hereby and does not apply to License Agreement.
WARRANTIES AND DISCLAIMER OF LIABILITY:
TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS". THERE IS NO WARRANTY PROVIDED IN THIS EULA, AND LICENSOR DISCLAIMS ANY WARRANTY OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS SPECIAL, OR THE WARRANTY OF NON-INFRINGEMENT.
Warning: you have no guarantees from the supplier or partner or software application
IN NO EVENT WILL LICENSOR OR ITS SUPPLIERS BE LIABLE TO YOU OR ANY THIRD PARTY ANY SPECIAL, INDIRECT OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES, OR ANY DAMAGES WHATSOEVER INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, THOSE RESULTING FROM LOSS OF USE, DATA OR BENEFITS THAT THE PROVIDERS OF LICENSE HAS BEEN ADVISED OR NOT OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES, AND IN CASE OF THEORY OR LIABILITY ARISING IN CONNECTION WITH THE USE OF THE SOFTWARE. SOME JURISDICTIONS DO NOT ALLOW THE EXCLUSION OR LIMITATION OF LIABILITY FOR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES, SO THE ABOVE LIMITATIONS MAY NOT APPLY TO YOU. THESE LIMITATIONS SHALL APPLY NOTWITHSTANDING ANY FAILURE OF ESSENTIAL PURPOSE OF ACTION JUSTICE LIMITED.
SEVERABILITY: In the event any provision of this EULA was declared invalid, illegal or unenforceable, the validity, legality and enforceability of the remaining provisions would in no way be affected or impaired and a provision valid, legal and binding purposes and economic impact Similar would be substituted.
ENTIRE AGREEMENT: This EULA constitutes the entire agreement between you and Licensor, supersedes all prior agreements, written or oral, regarding the software, and can not be amended except in writing signed by both parties.
